title: Enhance --init check with pre-flight validation
description:
The --init check should catch repository setup issues automatically:

## Problem
During session wrap-up, agent discovered beads database was missing but only logged it internally instead of surfacing to user. This is a gap in automated validation.

## Proposed Enhancement
Enhance check_protocol_compliance.py --init to verify:
- [ ] Beads database exists (or offer to create)
- [ ] Required git hooks installed  
- [ ] All tools at expected versions
- [ ] Workspace structure valid (e.g., .agent/ directory)

## Benefits
- Reduces agent cognitive load
- Catches setup issues before work begins
- Prevents session failures due to missing prerequisites
